document_data.name: Eastpeak
document_data.mainbody: '''Eastpeak''' was the tallest mountain that formed the range of hills and peaks known as the [[Shaeradim]] in the region of the [[Western Heartlands|Heartlands]] near [[the North]].
document_data.Description: The mountain was so large that for some months of the year, it briefly blocked the sun as it rose in the east, casting a shadow over [[Evereska]] in the morning hours. It lent its name to [[Tower Higher than Eastpeak]], the tallest spire built within the elven city.
document_data.Geography: Eastpeak was located in the southeast stretch of the Shaeradim, approximately {{SI|15|mi|k}} away from the mountain [[Ilaerothil]].
